content: crosswinds cowl was inspired by my area s windy climate and the airport by my home - i watch planes all the time from my backyard and on windy days i wonder what it s like to be in the pilot s seat with this cowl i can think about the wind while not being affected by it i used less than an entire ball of my yarn for this and as gauge isn t important you can really use anything as long as you reach the size and width you like my hope is this cowl will keep you warm and that the process of making it will be super fun
